name: TabbaT
description:
Tabbat a tale of two.

Controls 

Left Mouse Button = Pick up stuff. If pressed on the Bat Rail teleport Bat at that location.

Mouse = Tab movement

WASD = Bat Movement

B = Summon the ball in front of Bat

Spacebar = Shoot the ball [WASD can choose the direction]

POWERUP

Right mouse = Rotate Tab

Spacebar (when not shooting the ball) = Ball Catcher
